data.name: High Tech Low Life®
data.detailed_description:
High Tech Low Life is a third-person action-adventure game, set in a world inspired by
1980s/90s Cyberpunk Japanese Manga. Explore districts, with branched dialogue
choice, walk and talk, shoot and talk, active reload, slow time and engage in
third person firefights with challenging enemies.

When a newly trained special agent, a street kid, an unhinged leader
of a sleeper cell and it's enforcer. Find themselves entangled with
gang members, drug smugglers and drive traffickers.
Some of the most detestable individuals; the inhabitants of the Cardinal District.
The fate of their lives all come to a head.

High Tech Low Life for PC offers players the option to explore various
areas in and around the City of Solstice in resolutions up to 4K.

***Pre-Alpha game footage & UI - does not represent the final version***

data.short_description: High Tech Low Life® is a third-person action-adventure game, set in a world inspired by 1980s/90s Cyberpunk Japanese Manga. Explore districts, with branched dialogue choice, walk and talk, shoot and talk, active reload, slow time and engage in third person firefights with challenging enemies.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core i7 6700K @ 4.0 GHz (4 CPUs) / AMD Ryzen™ 7 1700X @ 3.4 GHz (8 CPUs)
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce® GTX 980 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: Over time downloadable content and programming changes will change the system requirements for this game. Please refer to your hardware manufacturer.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core i7 6700K @ 4.0 GHz (4 CPUs) / AMD Ryzen™ 7 1700X @ 3.4 GHz (8 CPUs)
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce® RTX 3060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: Over time downloadable content and programming changes will change the system requirements for this game. Please refer to your hardware manufacturer.

Minimum:

mac_requirements.recommended:
